Comment: Democratic politicians aren't going to save us.   Sure. Holding some town halls helps, because it creates conversations and local communities.   But we, the people, who are pro-democracy Americans, need to get out and start talking to our neighbors, co-workers, friends, and family members who did not vote in the last election. We need to wake up millions of those people.   And you can't wait for the Democratic politicians to reach them. They aren't listening to Democratic leaders. Which is why *we* have to talk to them face to face (or on the phone). Get them to see Trump for who he is and what he is about.   So, start doing that. Start talking to other Democrats you know and get them to do that. And quit hanging out on social media complaining that Democratic leaders aren't doing enough for you.
